dbprofile.sql:
SELECT tag.* FROM tag WHERE tag.status='0' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10 SELECT COUNT(tag.id) AS total, tag.id AS _tag__id, post.id AS _post__id, tag.status AS _tag__status, post.status AS _post__status, post_tag.post_id, post_tag.tag_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id FROM tag
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN post ON post.id = post_tag.post_id WHERE tag.id='29' AND post.id IS NOT NULL AND tag.id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY post_tag.post_id,post_tag.tag_id ASC
SELECT tag.id FROM tag WHERE tag.id=29 LIMIT 1 SELECT post_tag.post_id FROM post_tag WHERE post_tag.tag_id='29' ORDER BY post_tag.post_id DESC SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.status='1' ORDER BY post.createtime DESC LIMIT 0,4 SELECT *, post.id AS _post__id, tag.id AS _tag__id, tag.id, post.status AS _post__status, tag.status AS _tag__status, post_tag.tag_id, post_tag.post_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id FROM post
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON post.id = post_tag.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id WHERE tag.id=29 AND post.status='1' AND post.id IN (10448845,10448841)
ORDER BY post.createtime DESC, post_tag.tag_id,post_tag.post_id ASC
SELECT tag.* FROM tag WHERE tag.status='0' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10

SELECT tag.* FROM tag WHERE tag.status='0' ORDER BY RAND() LIMIT 10 SELECT COUNT(post.id) as _total FROM post WHERE post.status='1' LIMIT 1 SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.status='1' ORDER BY post.createtime DESC LIMIT 0,20 SELECT *, post.id AS _post__id, tag.id AS _tag__id, tag.id, post.status AS _post__status, tag.status AS _tag__status, post_tag.tag_id, post_tag.post_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id FROM post
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON post.id = post_tag.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id WHERE post.status='1' AND post.id IN (10448847,10448846,10448845,10448844,10448843,10448842,10448841,10448840,10448839)
ORDER BY post.createtime DESC, tag.name ASC, post_tag.tag_id,post_tag.post_id ASC

SELECT COUNT(tag.id) AS total, tag.id AS _tag__id, post.id AS _post__id, tag.status AS _tag__status, post.status AS _post__status, post_tag.post_id, post_tag.tag_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id FROM tag
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id LEFT OUTER JOIN post ON post.id = post_tag.post_id WHERE tag.id='30' AND post.id IS NOT NULL AND tag.id IS NOT NULL
ORDER BY post_tag.post_id,post_tag.tag_id ASC
SELECT tag.id FROM tag WHERE tag.id=30 LIMIT 1 SELECT post_tag.post_id FROM post_tag WHERE post_tag.tag_id='30' ORDER BY post_tag.post_id DESC SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.status='1' ORDER BY post.createtime DESC LIMIT 0,4 SELECT *, post.id AS _post__id, tag.id AS _tag__id, tag.id, post.status AS _post__status, tag.status AS _tag__status, post_tag.tag_id, post_tag.post_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id FROM post
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON post.id = post_tag.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id WHERE tag.id=30 AND post.status='1' AND post.id IN (10448847,10448846,10448845,10448844)
ORDER BY post.createtime DESC, post_tag.tag_id,post_tag.post_id ASC

SELECT post.id FROM post WHERE post.id='10448847' AND post.status='1' LIMIT 1 SELECT *, post.id AS _post__id, tag.id AS _tag__id, tag.id, post.status AS _post__status, tag.status AS _tag__status, post_tag.tag_id, post_tag.post_id ,post_tag.tag_id AS _tag__post_id ,post_tag.post_id AS _post__tag_id FROM post
LEFT OUTER JOIN post_tag ON post.id = post_tag.post_id LEFT OUTER JOIN tag ON tag.id = post_tag.tag_id WHERE post.id='10448847' AND post.status='1' AND post.id IN (10448847)
ORDER BY tag.name ASC, post_tag.tag_id,post_tag.post_id ASC
